value: - the monastery is dedicated to St. John the Forerunner. It was made in the 18th century and includes beautiful frescos and icons located in Rostuse.
- The largest mountain in the country located on the border with Albania
-It has excellent swimming, boating ,and fishing in the summer months. An additional point of interest is the half-submerged church in the lake.

-The ski center was renovated recently, so the capacity of the ski lifts and the ski chairs is increased. The ski trails start at 1960m and end at 1250m above sea level. It has two double lift chairs, one single lift chair with over 1100 person capacity per hour, several ski lifts with synchronized connection and over 5000 person capacity per hour.

value: content=Glamour is located just a few hundred meters from the slopes, and has a restaurant/bar as well as rooms to rent for skiers.  The staff speak some English and are more than accommodating.
